title.narrative: Legislation and policies related to Women’s Economic Empowerment (WEE), including those regarding Disaster Risk Reduction/Management (DRR/M) and Climate Change (CC), are gender responsive, in accordance with international normative frameworks and human ri

description.narrative: This outcome focuses on providing high quality technical advisory services to government ministries, such as Ministry of Labour, Invalids and Social Affairs (MOLISA) and Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development (MARD), for the review and reform of laws and policies on labor, employment and social protection to promote the economic rights and empowerment of women. The Outcome also focuses on strengthening representation and voices of CSOs and women's group's voices into policy development.
